name: ban
info: Allow you to ban someone in the guild!

name: kick
info: Allow you to kick someone in the guild!

name: prune
info: Delete various message at the same time!

name: addrole
info: Add a role to someone in the guild!

name: takerole
info: Take a role from someone in the guild!

name: buy
info: Information about how to buy the DE2OR MOD Menu!

name: mute
info: Allow you to mute someone in the guild!

name: hackban
info: Similiar to ipban, when a user with an id that is in the HackBan system enters, is automatically banned.

name: serverinfo
info: Shows the information about the guild
